explains: v. 忘记（forget 的过去分词）
wordGroup: forget oneself 忘我，忘乎所以；失去知觉
don't forget 请不要忘记；别忘了
forgive and forget 既往不咎；不念旧恶

sentences.en: I've forgotten where they live exactly.
sentences.cn: 我忘记了他们的确切住址。

sentences.en: You surely haven't forgotten Dr. Walters?
sentences.cn: 你肯定还没忘记沃尔特斯博士吧？

sentences.en: Alex had forgotten to charge the battery.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯忘了给电池充电。
